text:
L ouis Tomlinson fans can’t stop gushing over a picture of his son Freddie, saying he is a mini replica of his father.

Fans of the former One Direction singer went wild after Briana Jungwirth shared a rare picture of their 22-month-old on Instagram.

Jungwirth can be seen crouching down with her arms around the toddler who is smiling at the camera while standing on the pavement.

Fans were quick to point out the likeness between Freddie and his father, with many branding them the “spitting image” of each other.

One user commented: “He looks just like his father holy cow! The resemblance is crazy! It’s always neat to see who kids end up looking more like. So cute.”

Another posted: “He looks more and more like Louis every time I see him.”

A third wrote: “He takes after his father, he's like a little Louis.”

Tomlinson and Jungwirth welcomed their first child together in January 2016. He later rekindled his relationship with Eleanor Calder.

Tomlinson has been busy putting his debut solo album together and recently released his latest single Just Like You which he described as “very autobiographical and obviously about me.”

Speaking to Zane Lowe on Beats 1 Radio he said: “The fans have seen so much and got to know us so well, but I’ve never really had a chance to be as honest like that with music, so that was really refreshing.”

He continued: “It felt good to have a real advert there that was 100 per cent me. The important thing to me was that, I’ve read a lot of press stories about myself and the press and everyone naturally puts this spin on fame and celebrity, and I kind of just wanted to show the other side of it.”

Tomlinson said he has “always kind of struggled with the concept of fame” and that it was “important to me to write a song that could humanise me as much as possible and that the fans can really feel I’m just like them.”
title: ‘The resemblance is crazy!’: Louis Tomlinson fans gush over rare picture of son Freddie

meta_data.description: The adorable tot will turn two in January
